pullrequest.title: New parsing framework, drop the 2, parity basis

content.raw:
Fixed the seeds and removed the greek.  

I haven't done any thorough tests with the timesteppers on these problems, but if anyone goes through that it might make for a good page in the docs (i.e. just tracking which timesteppers we've found work better for which problems, with quantitative data on times-to-solution).
content.html:
Fixed the seeds and removed the greek.

I haven't done any thorough tests with the timesteppers on these problems, but if anyone goes through that it might make for a good page in the docs (i.e. just tracking which timesteppers we've found work better for which problems, with quantitative data on times-to-solution).
